lead_paragraph: North Korea barred foreigners from one of its most popular tourist events — the annual Pyongyang marathon — because of concerns over the Ebola virus, travel agencies said Monday.

headline.main: North Korea: Pyongyang Marathon Shut to Foreigners Over Ebola Fears
headline.print_headline: North Korea: Pyongyang Marathon Shut to Foreigners Over Ebola Fears

snippet: North Korea barred foreigners from one of its most popular tourist events — the annual Pyongyang marathon — because of concerns over the Ebola virus, travel agencies said Monday.
